data.title: Another Onsite to Texas, USA.
data.experience: With this onsite to US, shivam almost has revolved around the earth. data.title: The first onsite opportunity to Fiji.
data.experience: Ah! the first opprotunity to touch down outside India in eastern side of the globe. Fiji

data.title: An ethnic tour to Madhya Pradesh
data.experience: Ashish went on a tour to Madhaya Pradesh, starting with Vidisha, Sanchi, Udaygiri and explored heritage monuments and places, accompanied by the visit to Shivam's house.

data.title: To conduct an official Training
data.experience: I really don't believe, i went to take an official training for 5 days in Kolkata on Adobe Flex Fundamentals. Ahh!! What are those days  :)

data.title: Tour to Haj
data.experience: Naseem's long held dream of sending his parents to Hajj finally realized. Naseem Mummy Papa went to Saudi Arabia and had a great pilgrimage tour.
